title: LIVE NEAR EVERYWHERE YOU WANT TO BE
posting_body: ['Kodo', '2867 Sunset Pl, Los Angeles, CA, 90005', 'Want more information on this unit?', 'See link (below):', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 4', 'OR Text', '4', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'LUXURY BOUTIQUE STYLE LIVING.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 629 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'At KODO, we’re inspired by the connection and creativity that life in our neighborhood affords.', 'Here, residents are set within the heart of one of L.A.’s trendiest neighborhoods while moments from the cultural vibrancy of Downtown Los Angeles.', 'Home to several of L.A.’s best clubs, bars, live music venues and restaurants, Koreatown and Mid Wilshire are renowned for their nightlife and dining options, while the artistic allure of DTLA is a mere stone’s throw away.', 'Features', '- High Ceilings', '- Electronic Thermostat', '- Window Coverings', '- Hardwood Floors', '- Granite', '- Patio/Balcony - select units', '- Cable Ready', '- Microwave', '- Pets - Max 2 allowed*', '- Gas Range', '- Dishwasher - select units', '- Washer and Dryer in Unit', '- Large Closets', '- Refrigerator', 'Community Amenities', '- 24/7 Concierge Dry Cleaning*', '- Elevator', '- Complimentary High-speed Internet access', '- Assigned Underground Parking Available*', '- Controlled Access Building', '- Resident Lounge', '- The Rooftop Lounge with Stunning Views of Downtown Los Angeles', '- Private Conference Room', '- Dog Walking Service Available upon request*', '- Zen Courtyard and Co-working space', '- 24-hour Fitness Center Access', 'Driving Directions', 'From Wilshire Blvd Eastbound: Make a Right on Wilshire Place & a Left on Sunset Place.', 'From Wilshire Blvd Westbound: Make a Left on Hoover, Right on 7th St, Right onto Wilshire Place & Right onto Sunset Place', 'Office Hours', 'Tuesday-Saturday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly, contact for details.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Verifiable Income Equal to or Greater than 2.5x Monthly Rent', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'UUrG4b6ua']
